summary: Unit test module that validates the Bridgecrew platform integration logic, covering API endpoint URL handling, token and policy filter validation, metadata key extraction, service-specific URL overrides, configuration loading, on-premise mode setup, upload eligibility checks, and mapping skip behavior.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the platform integration components used for security scanning by detecting regressions in URL construction, authentication, policy management, and configuration handling.
